title: South Korea's president-elect nominates conservative lawmaker as finance chief - Reuters.com
content:
1. South Korea's president-elect nominates conservative lawmaker as finance chief  Reuters.com
  2. S. Korea Nominates Choo as Finance Minister With Prices in Focus  Bloomberg
  3. S.Korea lawmaker Choo Kyung-ho nominated as new finance minister -News1  WTVB
  4. South Korea's Yoon nominates conservative lawmaker as finance chief  Nikkei Asia
  5. (LEAD) (profile) Yoon's pick for finance minister says extra budget necessary despite inflation woes  Yonhap News Agency
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: South Korea's incoming President Yoon Suk-yeol on Sunday named Choo Kyung-ho to be deputy prime minister and finance minister, as the country seeks to tackle surging inflation, household debt and demand for welfare.
